roleset.name: make feel disgust

example.name: passive, no agent
example.text: Watson-1 turned away , [*-1]-2 sickened *trace*-2 for the first time in many months .
example.arg: for the first time in many months

example.name: passive, with agent
example.text: In the brief moment to talk to them before I took my post on the ring of defenses , I indicated I-1 was sickened [*-1] by the methods men employed to live and trade on the river .
example.arg: by the methods men employed to live and trade on the river

roleset.note: Framed by Neville. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1, change_bodily_state-40.8.4, marvel-31.3-1, marvel-31.3-6, other_cos-45.4. Updated by Julia, 11/2010.

example.name: with empty it
example.text: it *EXP*-1 sickens me [to think I missed the party]-1
example.arg: to think I missed the party

predicate.note: Frames file for 'sicken' based on sentences in brown corpus.
